DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate safety , level performance level comfort Canadian C-Spine rule prehospital set emergency medicine undergraduate .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Pilot Study Validating Canadian C-Spine Rule Pre-hospital
DOC.criteria: Alert , stable , adult patient present acute possible injury cervical spine Alert : GCS ≥ 14 Stable : systolic blood pressure ≥ 90 mmHg respiratory frequency 12 20 / min adult ≥ 18 year old Acute : ≤ 4 Possible injury cervical spine : posterior neck pain follow mechanism neck pain visible injury clavicle neck pain visible injury clavicle mechanism indicate cervical spine injury Acute paralysis ( quadriplegia , paraplegia ) Penetrating trauma neck Patients know vertebral disease ( ankylose spondylitis , rheumatoid arthritis , spinal stenosis , previous cervical spine surgery ) Pregnancy
